GPT-3 Paraphraser

Remove gender-bias from a job description

This demo shows how GPT-3 can be used to paraphrase a gender-biased job descriptions. To learn more about it see my Medium article!

Instructions

Below you can find two job descriptions which contain a lot of gender-biased language. The highlited words belong to a list of "Coded Masculine and Feminine Words" from the paper , which should rather be avoided. To see GPT-3 in action simply click on the buletpoints to open paraphrasing tooltip. This toolip provide you suggestions for reprahsing the biased statements.

Hover your mouse over buletpoints....

Administrative assistant

Company description

  • Our company works to offer every possible advantage to our banking customers.

  • The company boasts impressive salaries, allowing our employees with financial independence.

  • We are determined to stand apart from the competition.

Qualifications

  • Ability to deal with multiple senior staff in a demanding environment and navigate office hierarchy.

  • Cheerful, with strong communication skills.

  • Independent and self-reliant.

  • Strong computer skills.

Responsibilities

  • Organize and monitor office tasks and processes so that work progresses more efficiently.

  • Connect and develop relationships with a variety of clients (e.g., other businesses).

  • Control incoming and outgoing shipments.

Second Job

Company description

  • Our organization works to offer every possible advantage to our banking customers.

  • The company boasts impressive salaries, allowing our employees with financial independence.

  • We are determined to stand apart from the competition.

Qualifications

  • Ability to deal with multiple senior staff in a demanding environment and navigate office hierarchy.

  • Polite; sensitive to needs of other employees and clients.

  • Independent and self-reliant.

  • Strong computer skills.

Responsibilities

  • Organize and monitor office tasks and processes so that work progresses more efficiently.

  • Connect and develop relationships with a variety of clients (e.g., other businesses).

  • Control incoming and outgoing shipments.
